{{Actor| | type = Weapon | name = Large zorcher | doomednum = 2001 | class = LargeZorcher | game = Chex }}[[Classes|Classes:]]{{Class|Actor}}→{{Class|Inventory}}→{{Class|Weapon}}→{{Class|DoomWeapon}}→{{Class|Shotgun}}→LargeZorcher
The Chex Quest equivalent to the shotgun. Functions identically. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR LargeZorcher : {{Class|Shotgun}} { {{Property|Obituary}} "$OB_MPZORCH" // "%o was zorched by %k." {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$GOTLARGEZORCHER" // "You got the Large Zorcher!" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_LARGEZORCHER" // "Large Zorcher" }
